ing: 5 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers creme de cacao liqueur
des: "For those who like a little candy in their drinks - creme de cacao and chocolate syrup are shaken with vodka and ice."
ins: In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine vodka, creme de cacao and chocolate syrup. Shake vigorously and strain into 4 cocktail glasses.
